body_html:
Hi @facaiy ,
I want to run some heuristic after creating a complete graph and want to do fine grained placement of nodes of the graph while using high-level api's like loss functions, optimizers, functions from NN library etc. But using "with device annotations", I think I can only do placement on a very high-level. Please correct me if I am wrong. Thanks!

body:
Hi @facaiy ,
I want to run some heuristic after creating a complete graph and want to do fine grained placement of nodes of the graph while using high-level api's like loss functions, optimizers, functions from NN library etc. But using "with device annotations", I think I can only do placement on a very high-level. Please correct me if I am wrong. Thanks!
